review: The stick is fine. The motion pictures being offered to Prome users  are inferior.

review: Really like it!!!  Very user friendly, set up so easy and provides alot of options in one little stick/

review: Excellent!  Easy to install, great viewing options and well worth the cost.

review: I bought it for my daughter -who had no connection to cable and she was thrilled beyond words what it brought to her TV.

review: Bought it for my husband for his birthday and he loves it!  Easy to work and he gets to watch all of his favorite shows on netflix and amazon prime.

review: Better than my aplle tv!! Best streaming device ever!!
